channel.title: Need a loan
channel.description:
Hi,
My account is cleaned with virtually no gold apart from untradeable items. Can someone lend me anywhere from 5-10M so I can try my hand at staking? All will be paid back within a week with a +5% interest.
Thanks.

item.title: Need a loan
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

No one is going to be punished for this thread or anything, and apologies aren’t needed, the rule wasn’t in place then. It’s just going to cause the same problems as buying/selling would, which involves me in the middle trying to figure out who scammed who and who is telling the truth vs who is lying. I don’t want to do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a loan
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t like this stuff happening on the forum, it looks the same as buying/selling and is only going to cause problems…

Read full topic

item.title: Need a loan
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=500509.msg3660438#msg3660438 date=1310333135]
I once lent my bandos tassets (not using the system, because i already had something lent out) to a person I had never met before, but Speljohan knew XD Got them back in good time, trustworthy person
[/quote]My bank went from 50M to 8M in a month; 30-40M of it being lent. :P[/quote]
You should charge interest.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a loan
item.dc:creator: @DevilsCape DevilsCape
item.description:
@DevilsCape wrote:

Really I vain I is Great man , He always help people even if he doesn’t know them much … that’s what i like about him … It can be also kinda wrong to help strangers this much … But Your really really kind i like how u trust people and be sure they’r going to pay you back , your such a great person .

item.title: Need a loan
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=500509.msg3660327#msg3660327 date=1310327466]
He said staking, u might get 0 back.
[/quote]I loaned 5M to Adam (SJ_) and he got banned; but I know he’ll pay me back.

I believe I can trust the OP to pay me back whether he loses it or not.[/quote]

It’s only a 14 day ban, and it’s being appealed.
and if it was a perm ban I would of bought you a 90 day RS membership card in return.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a loan
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Reminds me of a show called Dragon’s Den. These 5 rich people get to choose who they want to work with, and they have to pay a specific amount of money to get a specific amount of ownership in percentage of the company.

“I want 500K for 40% of the company”
“Deal!”
“Gimmie money”
“Gimmie ownership”

But you always have to be careful in the person’s statistics. Whether they have a criminal record, how high their sales are, what product they are selling, etc. All has to be explained in the show.
It’s kinda the same with Runescape, you gotta check the dude’s PKing skills, how many times he lost/won, etc.

Read full topic
